name: Blessblood Bomber Jacket - Black Sparkle
description: A stylish black bomber jacket from the brand Blessblood. The jacket features a sparkly finish, giving it a unique and modern look. It has a full-zip closure, ribbed cuffs and hem, and a distinctive collar design. Two silver grommets are located on the chest. The back of the jacket features a prominent white Blessblood logo.
attributes: Sparkly black finish, full-zip, ribbed cuffs and hem, distinctive collar, two silver grommets on the chest, white Blessblood logo on the back. A version with a hood is also available.

name: Blessblood Bomber Jacket - Red Crocodile
description: A bold and eye-catching red bomber jacket from the Blessblood brand. This jacket features a striking crocodile-skin texture and a glossy finish. It has a full-zip closure, ribbed cuffs and hem, and two silver grommets on the chest. The back of the jacket is adorned with a prominent white Blessblood logo. A version with a hood is also available.
attributes: Red glossy finish with crocodile-skin texture, full-zip, ribbed cuffs and hem, two silver grommets on the chest, white Blessblood logo on the back. A version with a hood is also available.

name: Blessblood Racing Jacket
description: A sleek racing-style jacket from Blessblood, available in both black and green. This jacket features a full-zip front, a large white Blessblood logo on the chest, and two bold white stripes running down each sleeve. The sleeves also have zippered cuffs, adding to the racing aesthetic.
attributes: Racing-style jacket, full-zip, large white Blessblood logo on the chest, two white stripes on each sleeve, zippered cuffs.

name: Blessblood Velour Hoodie - Black
description: A comfortable and stylish velour hoodie from the brand Blessblood. This full-zip hoodie features a large white Blessblood logo on the chest and a more subtle, embossed black logo on the back. It has a full-zip front, a drawstring hood, and a plush, soft feel.
attributes: Black velour material, full-zip closure, drawstring hood, ribbed cuffs and hem, large white Blessblood logo on the front, embossed black Blessblood logo on the back.

name: Blessblood Cropped Hooded Jacket - Black
description: A unique cropped jacket with a hood, featuring a black texture and white grommets. The hood and shoulders are accented with white studs, and the sleeves have zippers, giving it a modern, edgy look. The front has 'BLOOD' and 'GOD' text in a stylized font.
attributes: Black textured material, full-zip, cropped fit, studded hood and shoulders, zippered sleeves, 'BLOOD GOD' text on the chest, available with yellow or black text and stripes.

name: Edifice Puffy Sleeve Jacket - Black
description: A fashion-forward black jacket with distinctive puffy, cinched sleeves and a cropped fit. The back of the jacket features the word 'EDIFICE' in a large, white print. This jacket has a full-zip closure and a unique, sleek design.
attributes: Black material, cropped length, puffy cinched sleeves, full-zip closure, 'EDIFICE' logo on the back. A version in a faux-leather material with a hood is also available.

name: Edifice Racing Jacket - Black
description: A sleek, black glossy jacket with a racing-inspired design. It features bold white shoulder accents and a single white stripe across the chest. The jacket has a full-zip front and two silver grommets on the chest. The collar features a Blessblood tag.
attributes: Black glossy material, racing-style design, full-zip, white shoulder accents, single white chest stripe, silver grommets on chest, Blessblood tag on the collar.
